name: That Christmas
starring: Brian Cox, Fiona Shaw, Jodie Whittaker
desc: It's an unforgettable Christmas for the townsfolk of Wellington-on-Sea when the worst snowstorm in history alters everyone's plans — including Santa's.

name: Spellbound
starring: achel Zegler, John Lithgow, Jenifer Lewis
desc: When a powerful spell turns her parents into giant monsters, a teenage princess must journey into the wild to reverse the curse before it's too late.

name: Dr. Seuss' The Grinch
starring: Benedict Cumberbatch, Cameron Seely, Rashida Jones
desc: A grump with a mean streak plots to bring Christmas to a halt in the cheerful town of Whoville. But a generous little girl could change his heart.

name: Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2
starring: Tabu, Kartik Aaryan, Kiara Advani
desc: When strangers Reet and Ruhan cross paths, their journey leads to an abandoned mansion and a dreaded spirit who has been trapped for 18 years.

name: Gangubai Kathiawadi
starring: Alia Bhatt, Vijay Raaz, Seema Pahwa
desc: Duped and sold to a brothel, a young woman fearlessly reclaims her power, using underworld connections to preside over the world she was once a pawn in.

starring: Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone, Pankaj Tripathi
desc: Amid doubt and derision, indomitable captain Kapil Dev leads India's struggling cricket team to make history at the 1983 World Cup. Based on true events.

name: The Ghazi Attack
starring: Rana Daggubati, Kay Kay Menon, Atul Kulkarni
desc: An underwater reconnaissance operation turns risky as a defiant Indian navy captain and his upstanding officer clash on how to approach the mission.

name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
starring: Hrithik Roshan, Abhay Deol, Farhan Akhtar
desc: Three friends on an adventurous road trip/bachelor party in Spain learn some lessons about themselves and each other that will change them forever.

name: Gifted
starring: Chris Evans, Mckenna Grace, Octavia Spencer
desc: A child prodigy gets caught in a custody battle between the kindhearted uncle who raised her and the grandmother who wants to cultivate her genius.

name: INETSTELLAR
starring: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain
desc: With humanity teetering on the brink of extinction, a group of astronauts travels through a wormhole in search of another inhabitable planet.

name: Kal Ho Naa Ho
starring: Shah Rukh Khan, Saif Ali Khan, Preity Zinta
desc: An uptight MBA student falls for the charismatic new neighbor who charms her troubled family – but he has a secret that forces him to push her away.

name: The Green Mile
starring: Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse
desc: When a prison guard discovers that a man on death row possesses mysterious powers, he desperately tries to stop the execution.

name: Minnal Murali
starring: Tovino Thomas, Guru Somasundaram, Aju Varghese

name: Society of the Snow
starring: Enzo Vogrincic, Agustín Pardella, Matías Recalt
desc: Following a plane crash in the remote heart of the Andes, survivors join forces and become each other's best hope as they navigate their way back home.

name: It Ends with Us
starring: Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate
desc: A florist's seemingly perfect relationship unravels when an old flame re-enters the picture, forcing her to make a difficult choice about her future.

name: Khufiya
starring: Tabu, Ali Fazal, Wamiqa Gabbi
desc: When a mole in an intelligence unit leads to the murder of an undercover spy, a hardened agent relentlessly pursues him to avenge the death.

name: Hum Aapke Hain Koun
starring: Madhuri Dixit, Salman Khan, Mohnish Bahl
desc: Although Nisha falls for Prem, she agrees to marry his older brother for the good of their families. But fate may have other plans for the lovebirds.

name: Mowgli: Legend of the Jungle
starring: Christian Bale, Cate Blanchett, Benedict Cumberbatch
desc: An orphaned boy raised by animals in the jungle seizes his destiny while confronting a dangerous enemy -- and his own human origins.

name: Thalaivii
starring: Kangana Ranaut, Arvind Swamy, Nassar
desc: This biopic charts the life of actor-turned-chief minister Jayaram Jayalalitha and the relationship paving her rapid yet complicated path to power.

starring: Jim Sturgess, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth
desc: A brilliant group of students become card-counting experts with the intent of swindling millions out of Las Vegas casinos by playing blackjack.

name: Enola Holmes
starring: Millie Bobby Brown, Henry Cavill, Sam Claflin
desc: While searching for her missing mother, intrepid teen Enola Holmes uses her sleuthing skills to outsmart big brother Sherlock and help a runaway lord.

name: Leave the World Behind
starring: Julia Roberts, Mahershala Ali, Ethan Hawke
desc: A family's getaway to a luxurious rental home takes an ominous turn when a cyberattack knocks out their devices — and two strangers appear at their door.

name: The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind
starring: Maxwell Simba, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Aïssa Maïga
desc: Inspired by a science book, 13-year-old William Kamkwamba builds a wind turbine to save his Malawian village from famine. Based on a true story.

name: The Children's Train
starring: Barbara Ronchi, Serena Rossi, Christian Cervone

name: The Bone Collector
starring: Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Queen Latifah
desc: A rookie cop reluctantly teams with a paralyzed ex-detective to catch a grisly serial killer dubbed the Bone Collector in this crime thriller.

name: Twiliht
starring: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Billy Burke
desc: The forbidden romance between a mortal teen and a vampire summons danger when their love turns powerful — like the forces fighting against it.

name: Love at First Sight
starring: Haley Lu Richardson, Ben Hardy, Jameela Jamil
desc: Two strangers connect on a flight to London, only to be separated by a twist of fate. A reunion seems improbable — but love has a way of defying the odds.

name: The Godfather
starring: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan
desc: Michael Corleone, the war-hero youngest son of a powerful New York crime boss, joins the family business when his father is targeted for assassination.

name: Colors of Evil: Red
starring: Jakub Gierszał, Maja Ostaszewska, Zofia Jastrzębska
desc: When a girl's body is found on a beach in Poland's Tricity, a prosecutor teams up with the victim's mother on an impassioned quest for the truth.

name: Moneyball
starring: Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill, Philip Seymour Hoffman
desc: Frustrated that his baseball team can't afford big-money players, Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane bets on a bold new strategy to change the game.
